stripes start do not cut the black yarn but start 9 using the orange yarn for round 7 each round when switching colors be sure to catch the previous color under one stitch to keep it from loosening up 7 work even in orange 9 stuff foot at this point 8 work even in black 9 9 work even in orange 9 10 work even in black 9 11 work even in orange 9 12 work even in black 9 13 work even in orange 9 14
